title: Highest Binding Coverage for Primary Products
description: In 2022, Grenada achieved a 100% binding coverage for primary products, ensuring maximum tariff protection for its agricultural and raw material sectors.

title: Lowest Net ODA Received as a Percentage of GNI
description: Grenada recorded a negative net ODA received at -8.19% of its Gross National Income in 2022, indicating a net outflow of aid relative to its economic size.

title: Lowest Net ODA Received as a Percentage of Imports
description: In 2022, Grenada had a net ODA received at -10.49% of its imports of goods, services, and primary income, reflecting a significant outflow of aid compared to its import levels.

title: Lowest Net ODA Received Per Capita
description: Grenada's net ODA received per capita was -$800.94 in 2022, highlighting a substantial outflow of aid per individual in the country.

title: Minimal Grants Received
description: In 2022, Grenada received $1,860,000 in grants, excluding technical cooperation, marking a low level of financial aid from external sources.
